DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine energy expenditure and fat oxidation in 2 year old children.
DOC.brief_title: Total Energy Expenditure and Fat Oxidation in 2 Year Old Children
DOC.criteria: 1.52.5 years of age Mother is a participant of the Glowing study (NCT01131117) Healthy without taking medication that can affect study outcomes, as determined by the PI None listed
